channel.title: Deep Packet Inspection
channel.description:
Hi!
I am curious: is Whonix vulnerable to Deep Packet Inspection software provided by NSA?
"... and not even malware with root privileges can find out the user's real IP."
This.

item.title: Deep Packet Inspection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
We support various platforms.

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Build_Documentation/Physical_Isolation
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/KVM
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox

Research. Take your pick.

I don’t think it would be wise if I made a definitive recommendation.

Read full topic

item.description:
this will help , maybe its a partial answer for ur Q but that will be enough i think.

item.title: Deep Packet Inspection
item.dc:creator: omegamegaman
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:2, topic:1139”]I don’t think anyone knows that. Hard to seriously answer with “no”, because it’s hard to prove a negative.

Basically that’s up to Tor. Rephrase. Replace “Whonix” with “Tor” as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian. Depending on that conclusion, that also goes for Whonix.

See also:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning#Tor_doesn.27t_protect_you_from_a_global_adversary
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning#Confirmation_attacks
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning[/quote]

Is it safe to run Whonix under VirtualBox or do you recommend a different software? Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Deep Packet Inspection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I don’t think anyone knows that. Hard to seriously answer with “no”, because it’s hard to prove a negative.

Basically that’s up to Tor. Rephrase. Replace “Whonix” with “Tor” as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian. Depending on that conclusion, that also goes for Whonix.

See also:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning#Tor_doesn.27t_protect_you_from_a_global_adversary
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning#Confirmation_attacks
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Warning

Read full topic
